title: Circle Packing, Bubble Chart
createdBy: Issac Saunders, James Laff, and Tao Chen
sourceText: Flare Framework - UC Berkeley Visualization Lab (Jeff Heer)

properties.description: The outer width of the chart, in pixels.
The all padding all around each circle, in pixels.
The all margin all around, in pixels.
The static fill color, if no group channel is specified.
The fill opacity of the bubbles.
The static stroke around the bubbles.
The stroke width around the bubbles, if any.
The stroke opacity around the bubbles, if any.
